Summary: Large, star like, round, very bright, moving across sky slowly.
divs: Sighting Details while camping on the Oregon coast near Garibaldi with my family, my brother in law and I saw a large, very bright, star like object moving slowly above us. It was obviously not a star because it was moving slow like a helicopter except there was no sound.The size of this single very bright light was so large it could not have been a satellight. we only saw it for a few seconds because of trees around us. I saw it first and pointed it out to him. We both said huh! and chuckled. Later the more I thought of it the more I knew it was odd.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Garibaldi
This sighting has never been favorited.
